page.title: 11Stanground Library
page.content: Stanground Library opened in 1963.It is open every day except Wednesday and Sunday.It has a great many books on different subjects and you may borrow four books at a time and keep them for four weeks.The fiction books have coloured stickers on them to show what kind of story you can chose.It might be crime,or romance,or war.The non-fiction sections have books on all kinds of subjects.We saw books on nature,history,gardening,animals, languages and many other things.There are also books for children.Small children can choose picture books and there are stories for older children. You are not allowed to eat in the library,or smoke,or make a noise,or bring your dog in.
